title: Camila Mendes looks radiant in blue as she heads inside to Good Morning America
text:
It's an early morning for Riverdale star Camila Mendes who stepped out for an appearance on Good Morning America.

The 25-year-old actress was dressed in a dazzling blue wrap dress that made the most of her curves.

The beauty was on the show to talk about her new project with Secret: she is promoting their new essential oils line. While on the morning show she said Lavender was her favorite scent.

Early morning: It's an early morning for Riverdale star Camila Mendes who stepped out for an appearance on Good Morning America to partner with Secret deodorant and their new essential oils line

Camila said she felt the relationship with Secret just clicked.

'I loved partnering with them,' the TV star began.

'You always want to do campaigns that you feel like you resonate with. You know what I mean? So you can actually genuinely be the face of something or endorse it,' she said while on the morning show.

Looking good: She stepped out in a dazzling blue number as she headed inside to chat about all things beauty and why she decided to team up with the brand

Just a couple of days ago the Hollywood newcomer was announced as the brand's new ambassador after she starred in their latest commercial premiering the collection.

During her interview, she spoke about the company's initiatives and why she chose to work with Secret before saying she admired that they donated 'half a million dollars' to the U.S. Women's Soccer Team to help fight for equal pay for those women.

'It's really cool when brands kind of take responsibility and take action on important topics,' she continued.

Brand ambassador: During her interview, she spoke about the company's initiatives and why she chose to work with Secret before saying she admired that they donated 'half a million dollars' to the U.S. Women's Soccer Team to help fight for equal pay for those women

Big fan: Camila spoke about her own love for essential oils and revealed she was wearing lavender on her for the segment

For the occasion, she wore a bright blue mid-length dress that had long shoulders and a high slit that cut above her knee.

She wore a pair of bright green pumps with a transparent strap over the top of her foot to add yet another pop of color to her look.

Her dark hair was worn in her signature style full of loose curls as she smiled for the cameras and posed for pictures with fans.

After the show: After the segment Camila posed for a couple of pictures with host Ginger that Good Morning America shared to their Instagram

This just in: Just a couple of days ago the Hollywood newcomer was announced as the brand's new ambassador after she starred in their latest commercial premiering the collection

Camila's role as Veronica on the hit CW show is actually her first role in the Hollywood scene.

'My agent said, 'Oh, you know they are probably going to cast a Krysten Ritter type.' A white pin-up-looking girl. I was like, 'Yeah, you're right!' So I disregarded it,' she said during an interview with Coveteur at the time. She went on to say she heard from a friend that producers were leaning towards making the character a Latina and that's when she took the leap.

'So I call my agent immediately and I was like, 'You need to get me in that room,'' Mendes said. 'She told me, 'Don't worry, we're on it.''

'Either my life was going to change and could transform into something I've always dreamed of, or it would just go about the way it was as if nothing ever happened,' she continued. 'That was a really scary thought, that I could get so close to something that honestly felt so right. I had never felt so confident about playing a character in my life as I did with Veronica.'
